content.rendered:
Fry’s Battered Prawn-Style Pieces with B-Well Garlic Oil

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 box Fry’s Battered Prawn-Style Pieces
B-Well Canola Oil for frying
Purple onion, chopped
Cherry tomatoes sliced
Coriander, chopped
B-Well garlic oil
Salt and pepper
B-Well Tangy Mayo
Skewers, for serving
Chilli flakes and black salt, for garnish

Directions

In a pan, on high heat, fry the Prawns in some oil. Drain and season with chilli flakes and black salt. Thread the Prawns on the skewers.

Make the salsa by combining the onion, tomatoes, coriander, salt, pepper and mayo.

Serve the salsa with the Prawns.
